name: Twitter RT Button Outlined
description: Make Twitter RT(Retweet) Button outlined for accessibility. Originally we found this great idea on some tweet and realize it. # special thanks to https://stackoverflow.com/a/18330345 Try other our userstyles for Twitter: - Pastel Color Twitter - Fast Twitter 2020 üç∫ To support us, you can buy us a beer!
additional_info: 2021/8/12 follow Twitter changes few, RT button on image dialog (https://twitter.com/TwitterDesign/status/1425505308563099650) 2021/7/17 follow Twitter changes body background color definition 2020/7/18 add domain application section (it was global...) 2020/7/14 fix for full screened image view 2020/7/11 add support for dim & dark mode 2020/6/30 works better with Pastel Color Twitter userstyles 2020/06/20 initial release
